content.rendered:
We are delighted to present our Annual Publication 2025, marking the 150th anniversary of Mannheimer Swartling. This special edition reflects on our firm’s journey since 1875 and explores a number of key issues shaping business law today.

Among topics this year, we explore:

  • SAS FORWARD – how SAS transformed its business and secured its future as Scandinavia’s leading airline
  • Workplace rights in an evolving landscape of technology and privacy
  • How businesses can prepare for CS3D
  • The regulatory path to market for advanced therapy medicinal products

Beyond legal developments, we highlight our commitment to sustainability, pro bono work, and innovation, as well as the people and values that have defined Mannheimer Swartling for 150 years.

We hope you enjoy reading!

Mannheimer Swartling Annual Publication 2025 (link opens external website).
